section.title: Introduction
section.para: FlyMine is an integrated database of genomic, expression and protein data for Drosophila, Anopheles and C. elegans. Integrating data makes it possible to run sophisticated data mining queries that span domains of biological knowledge.

para.ulink: What can I do with FlyMine?

section.para: This is release 8.0 of FlyMine. See the release notes to find out whats new.

section.title: Quick Search
section.para: Search for genes, proteins or any other annotation. Help.

section.title: Aspects
section.para: Choose an aspect to explore the different types of data in FlyMine and start queries.

section.title: Template search
section.para: Enter a keyword to find pre-defined template queries relating to a certain type of data. Select 'Public templates' to search pre-defined templates, 'My templates' to search templates you have created yourself or 'Everything' to search all templates.

section.title: FlyMine QueryBuilder
section.para: Advanced users can use a flexible query interface to construct their own data mining queries. See user manual and tutorials.
